pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulate INAR/ZINAR(p) Models and Estimate Its Parameters // Simulation, exploratory data analysis and Bayesian analysis of the p-order Integer-valued Autoregressive (INAR(p)) and Zero- inflated p-order Integer-valued Autoregressive (ZINAR(p)) processes, as described in Garay et al. (2020) doi:10.1080/00949655.2020.1754819.
